document.full_text: the eu/imf team conducting talks for portugal's bailout is considering giving the country more time to reach the budget deficit targets set for this year and next, a business newspaper reported on wednesday.
document.title: eu/imf may give portugal more time to cut deficit: report
lines_and_colors: the eu/imf team conducting talks for portugal's bailout is considering giving the country more time to reach the budget deficit targets set for this year and next, a business newspaper reported on wednesday.
